query:
SELECT 
  'Teachers' as tableName, COUNT(*) as totalRecords, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN avatarUrl IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as withAvatars,
  SUM(CASE WHEN longSummary IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as withLongSummary
FROM teachers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Themes', COUNT(*), COUNT(*), COUNT(*) FROM themes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Quotes', COUNT(*), 
  SUM(CASE WHEN teacherId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN isFeatured = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM quotes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Key Ideas', COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN teacherId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN summary IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM keyIdeas
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Practices', COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN teacherId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN variations IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM practices
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Central Questions', COUNT(*),
  SUM(CASE WHEN teacherId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),
  SUM(CASE WHEN explanation IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
FROM centralQuestions;
